item.text: The [[Viral Academy]] residency programme is a new form of residency exchange, which takes ideeas from [[Couch Surfing]], and from [[Time Banking]] to create a sustainable form of knowledge transfer without any money changing hands.

The [[Viral Academy]] is a P2P framework for creating online and offline learning experiences. Students are encouraged to pass on their learning by the built in [[Learning TimeBank]], which enables us to offer all courses for free to anyone in the world.
item.title: Viral Academy Methodology

story.text: The [[Viral Academy]] residency programme is a new form of residency exchange, which takes ideeas from [[Couch Surfing]], and from [[Time Banking]] to create a sustainable form of knowledge transfer without any money changing hands.

The [[Viral Academy]] is a P2P framework for creating online and offline learning experiences. Students are encouraged to pass on their learning by the built in [[Learning TimeBank]], which enables us to offer all courses for free to anyone in the world.
